name: Peach Basil Kefir Smoothie
description: A sophisticated take on peaches and cream, this 3-ingredient smoothie combines fresh peaches, basil, and frozen kefir cubes.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons plain whole-milk kefir
2 ripe medium peaches, pitted and quartered

recipeInstructions.text: For the Kefir Ice Cubes: Divide kefir between 5 slots of an ice cube tray, using about 2 tablespoons for each cube. Freeze overnight, remove from the tray, and store in a zipper-lock bag in the freezer.

For the Smoothie: Blend peaches at medium speed until smooth, scraping the sides as needed. Add basil and kefir ice cubes and blend until completely smooth. Serve immediately garnished with extra peaches, if desired.
